pageContext.description: Socket broken, hole in ferrule on back. Much damaged.
pageContext.patina: Thick patina brown. Flaked off in places.
pageContext.collection: Private Collection,Sir B. Windle (1924), CCCC III,given by R. Thursfield Esq. Broseley,St. Michael's College, Toronto,Colton Collection, Bromsgrove
pageContext.site: England,Shropshire,Little Wenlock,at foot of Wrekin,Possibly Willow Moor hoard
pageContext.toSearch: Little Wenlock, Telford, Telford And Wrekin Tf6, UK
pageContext.remarks: Label inside ferrule: "Bronze spearhead found at the foot of the Wrekin, Salop. Given to me by R. Thursfield Esq, Broseley"
